name: Emoji TD (itch)
description:
If there's one thing we know about Emojis, it's that they *checks notes* love to defend against sequential waves of enemies...? Well, if you say so! 🤷‍♀️

Features
🙂 Nice and simple tower defense gameplay!
😘 Six campaigns with lots of levels each!
🤔 Each level has a different set of emojis and enemies for you to deal with!
😎 Collect money to upgrade your emojis!
🤣 Earn shiny medals if you do well!

Wow!!!!!
